content: Meanwhile, I just wanted to see her face when she realizes it’s all a lie. When her tears don’t overflow in joy, but are withdrawn, puff up the face and are afraid to fall. It’s all a game. She fell for someone who would never fall for her. She says, “I’ve never believed in love until I met you.” And I just think the whole time, “I’ll never believe in love until I break your heart to prove it exist.”
